mapper.sql: select u.id, u.dept_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.password, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.created, u.remark, u.salt, u.two_factor_auth_key, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select:
select u.id, u.dept_id, u.nickname, u.username, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber, u.sex, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.created, u.remark, u.salt, u.two_factor_auth_key, d.dept_name, d.leader from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id where u.del_flag = '0'
AND u.id = #{id}
AND u.username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
AND u.status = #{status}
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
AND date_format(u.created,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND date_format(u.created,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND (u.dept_id = #{deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.dept_id FROM sys_dept t WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},ancestors) ))
${params.dataScope} order by u.created desc

select distinct u.id, u.dept_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.status, u.created, u.salt, u.two_factor_auth_key from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.del_flag = '0' and (r.role_id != #{roleId} or r.role_id IS NULL) and u.id not in (select u.id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId})
AND u.username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
${params.dataScope}
select id, username from sys_user where username = #{username} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select id, phonenumber from sys_user where phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select id, email from sys_user where email = #{email} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( id, dept_id, username, nickname, salt, two_factor_auth_key, email, avatar, phonenumber, sex, password, status, create_by, remark, created )values( #{id}, #{deptId}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{salt}, #{twoFactorAuthKey}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update sys_user set avatar = #{avatar} where username = #{username}
update sys_user set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
mapper.delete: update sys_user set del_flag = '2' where id = #{id}
